matha athithaye wishaghora sarpayinge ha wana sathunge raja dahanak lesa pawathiya da buduradun jiwamanawa wada siti mema aithihasika pradeshaya kese ho pilisakara kara eya mahajanathawage gaurawadarayatath shasanika unnathiyatath jathika prabodhayatath hethuwanu pinisa diyunu kala yuthu bawata unwahanse thira adhishtanayakata paminiyaha.unwahanse thula pawathi ema apekshawa yatharthayak bawata pathkirime abhilashaya sithhi thabagena ‘nadaya’ samaga yali gallata wadama kara sumedhankara na himiyo ewakata mehi aandukarawaraya lesa katayuthu kala wiliyam henri manin mahatha hamuwi seruwawila sanwardhanaya sandaha awashya rajya anugrahaya laba gaththe ya.1922 warshaye sita 1924 dakwa wu keti kalaya atharathura wihara sanwardhanayata awashya pasubima godanagagath unwahanse ‘seruwawila wihara chaithya sanwardhana’ namin samithiyak aarambhakara siyalu denage dayakathwayen nawatha wehera wahanse bandawa 1931 wasaredi athi uthkarshawath lesa seruwila mangala maha saye koth palandawime punyithsawayak pawathwuha.

2011 wasaredi angaharu bala yana yanayaka geniyana mayikro chipayak thama me de sandaha owun upakari karaganne.obata obage nama, rata saha sitina pradeshaye sanketha ankaya ehi gabada kara thabannata nasa aayathanaya lowa pura inna hamotama awasthawa laba dila thiyenawa.danata (me lipiya liyana awasthawa wana wita ) lowa pura pudgalayin 531718 denek siya nam ema chipaye sandahan karala thiyenawa.me athara shrilankawa niyojanaya karamin pudgalayin 830 denek siya nam labadila thiyenawa.eewagema kiyanna oone me sandaha nam labadena ayata nasa aayathanaya magin alankara sahathikapathrayak sihiwatanayak hatiyata labadenawa.ee madiliyen labadena mema sihiwatanaya kamathinam mudranaya karagannatath obata awasthawa thiyenawa.bohoma winodajanaka me deta kamathinam obath sahabhagiwela balanna.
